DOC.criteria: Demonstrate understanding study sign inform consent form prior studyrelated procedure Healthy clinically significant abnormality determine medical history Women must neither pregnant lactating ( produce breast milk ) negative urine pregnancy test Screening Visit 1 Women childbearing potential men must agree use adequate birth control measure ( determine investigator ) must agree continue use measure plan pregnancy Day 6 visit Men must agree donate sperm study Day 6 visit Have document serumneutralizing antibody titer > 2fold dilution HRV16 blood sample within approximately 40 day Screening Visit 2 Live family member care elderly , infant , small child ( eg , nursing home day care provider ) , live someone chronic lung disease , premature infant , immunocompromised individual Require prescription overthecounter medication regular basis ( 3 time per week ) , except contraceptive preparation , hormone replacement therapy , topical acne medication Have history chronic disease Investigator believe clinically significant Have history chronic headache ( eg frequent migraine , cluster headache ) 3 headache per week
